price: 61 Ils dirent : « Nous ferons de notre mieux pour convaincre son père de le laisser nous accompagner. »
arabic: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qālū sanurāwidu ʿanhu abāhu wa-innā lafāʿilūna
translations: We will try to get permission
